text: Grateful to receive my first dose of the #Pfizer #Covid19 #vaccine today. When your turn comes, I hope you'll also do the same because each jab gets us one step closer to herd immunity.  #WearAMask & #GetVaccinated bc we are #InThisTogether #BlackHealthMatters #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/MwXEEVHpeS
